title: Loyca.ai
description: An open-source, local-first desktop AI assistant that quietly watches your screen, understands your context, and helps you when you need it.

title: Transformers.js Playground
description: A playground for experimenting with the Transformers.js library, showcasing the capabilities of the library and how it can be used in web applications.

title: Personal Website
description: My personal website built with SvelteKit, featuring a blog and projects showcase. Blog entries can be written in Markdown or Jupyter Notebooks, with support to run Python code using Pyodide.

title: LLM-Powered Slack Agent
description: An LLM-powered Slack bot built in mid-2023 that enables channel-specific personalities, commands, and configurations, supporting intelligent, context-aware interactions through ReACT (Reasoning and Acting) and RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) for enhanced tool use and knowledge integration.
